column4: when I type make, to compile a program from source, it gives me this..
make: *** No targets specified and no makefile found.  Stop.
no need to compile, just install it from the universe repository using your favorite package manager
ok, what's the issue with synaptics?
did what?  you need to address people or we will get lost :)
you need to replace /path/to/virtualboxdeb" with the actual path to the virtual box deb in my command...
you should get some kind of prompt that you need to agree to
k, now install pork:  sudo aptitude install pork
is your user a member of the "vboxusers" group?
sudo adduser YOUR_USERNAME vboxusers     and then logout and back in
